byline.contributor: Eric Schmitt contributed reporting from Washington.

abstract: United States designates Denis Cuspert, former German gang member and rapper, as global terrorist for allegedly promoting Islamic State.
lead_paragraph: Denis Cuspert, a former German gang member and gangsta rapper, is now a “specially designated global terrorist” sought worldwide for his alleged promotion of the Islamic State militant group.

headline.main: Rapper, Shaped by Tumultuous German Youth, Is Designated a Global Terrorist
headline.print_headline: Rapper, Shaped by Tumultuous German Youth, Is Designated a Global Terrorist

snippet: Denis Cuspert, a former German gang member and gangsta rapper, is now a “specially designated global terrorist” sought worldwide for his alleged promotion of the Islamic State militant group.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
